>
[Undying Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4525) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4514)

</column>

---

You resist death’s clutches with supernatural vigor, daring death to claim you while promising that any such attempt will surely fail. When you use [Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=83), you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.
name: Undying Ferocity
